long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WA Number Checker is an intelligent tool that can verify, check, and filter WhatsApp numbers, providing you with an efficient, convenient, and secure contact number management experience.

This extension is not only the ideal choice for checking and filtering WhatsApp phone numbers, but also can verify active WhatsApp numbers, offering comprehensive number management functions.

As the preferred WhatsApp number checker, filter, and validator extension, it provides marketing and sales companies with very practical functions, allowing easy filtering of bulk contact lists from any country/region with number ranges.

ğŸŸ¥ How to get started?
Simply log in to web.whatsapp.com, scan to log in, open the tool, enter the numbers you want to query, and then click "Start Checking" to quickly see if there is a bulk list of WhatsApp numbers.

ğŸŸ¥ Key features include:
âœ… Verify bulk lists
âœ… Verify any number from any country
âœ… 100% accurate and high-speed validator
âœ… Phone number generator
âœ… All check progress is saved in the history log
âœ… Download successful/failed lists as CSV files

ğŸŸ¥ Data privacy protection
we will never share any data with third parties. All data is processed on your local computer and never goes through our network servers, ensuring your privacy and security.
